problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, the diameter AB = N_0, BC is the chord, ∠ABC = N_1, point P is on BC, point Q is on ⊙O, and OP ⊥ PQ, ​​when point P moves on BC, then The maximum value of PQ length is ()
raw_answer:
解:如图,连接OQ,∵PQ=√{0Q^{2}-0P^{2}},且OQ=4,∴当OP最小时,PQ最大,∴当OP⊥BC时,PQ的值最大,∵∠ABC=30°,∴OP=\frac{1}{2}OB=2∴PQ=√{0Q^{2}-0P^{2}}=2√{3},
故选:D．
